sentences.en: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

sentences.en: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.cn: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

sentences.en: Even from a distance the effect of his fox costume was stunning.
sentences.cn: 即使从远处看，他的狐狸戏服也很抢眼。

sentences.en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentences.cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentences.en: he went the distance after being floored in the first round.
sentences.cn: 他在第一回合被击倒在地，后来一直坚持到底。

sentences.en: her flat is within walking distance.
sentences.cn: 她的公寓很近，走过去就到了。

sentences.en: I believe we are within striking distance of an agreement.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们即将达成协议。

sentences.en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentences.en: It was within easy walking distance of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 它离旅馆仅几步之遥。

sentences.en: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.
sentences.cn: 杰伊一贯和他的女朋友们保持距离。

sentences.en: keep your distance from birds feeding their young.
sentences.cn: 离给幼鸟喂食的鸟远点。

sentences.en: Kenya's long distance runners have taken the athletics world by storm.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的长跑运动员在田径界获得了巨大成功。

sentences.en: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.cn: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.en: More riders than ever are now determined to go the distance.
sentences.cn: 现在越来越多的骑手决心赛完全程。

sentences.en: The author distanced himself from some of the comments in his book.
sentences.cn: 作者在他的书里对某些评论淡然处之。

sentences.en: The broadcast media sniffily affects to distance itself from the press.
sentences.cn: 广播媒体态度轻蔑地故作姿态，要跟新闻媒体保持距离。

sentences.en: The city centre and shops are only a short distance away.
sentences.cn: 市中心和商店离得很近。

sentences.en: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.cn: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.en: the hotel is &B{within} easy driving &B{distance of} Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆从伯明翰开车很快就到。

sentences.en: The wail of the bagpipe could be heard in the distance.
sentences.cn: 远远地能听到风笛的呜咽。

sentences.en: There was a vast distance between psychological clues and concrete proof.
sentences.cn: 心理提示和确凿证据之间相差甚远。

sentences.en: There were periods of sulking, of pronounced distance, of coldness.
sentences.cn: 沉闷、明显不友好和冷淡的场面多次出现。

sentences.en: Trains are reliable, cheap and best for long-distance journeys.
sentences.cn: 火车安全可靠、费用低廉，最适宜长途旅行。

phrases.tran_cn: 远程教育；广播教育，函授教育

phrases.phrase: distance lends enchantment to the view

phrases.tran_cn: (拳击)坚持下来，在比赛中未被击倒
在攻击距离之内；可能性很大

trans.tran_cn: 距离，遥远，久远，疏远，远方，冷淡
trans.tran_en: the amount of space between two places or things
If you distance yourself from a person or thing, or if something distances you from them, you feel less friendly or positive toward them, or become less involved with them
